resources.string:
Hello, My name is Chike. 

I am an inspiring software engineer who is currently under 6 months of internship and I have decided to go into mobile development. 
During the past 2 months of my internship,I can proudly say that I have experienced a lot of cool new features and how to make the world a better place and I pray and hope that I would be the best mobile dev once I finish my internship with Qucoon Limited. 
All I have to do is to put im my best and leave the rest to God for he is the author and finisher of my faith. 

Nothing is Impossible with him.
